web_snippets: Jake Tapper. Writer: The Outpost. Jake Tapper was born on 12 March 1969 ... Was once voted most politically biased anchor on CNN. Has 2 children: son ...
Jake Tapper is a hugely-influential and award-winning American journalist who currently serves as Chief Washington Correspondent for CNN.
Discover the fascinating life and career of Jake Tapper, one of America's most respected political journalists and CNN's chief Washington correspondent.
